Parameters: Runnable: the runnable task requested to be executed
ThreadPoolExecutor: the executor attempting to execute this task
rejectedExecution(java.lang.Runnable,jav.Description: Does nothing, which has the effect of discarding task r.
rejectedExecution(java.lang.Runnable,jav.FullName: public void rejectedExecution (Runnable r, ThreadPoolExecutor e)

ClassDesc: A handler for rejected tasks that silently discards the rejected task.
